attributes.action: Decrease price of food "reduced section" in stores and display near the entrance
attributes.additional_details: I believe this will reduce food wastage across the UK to a significant low that the UK needs!
attributes.background: Require stores to display a reduced section nearer to the front of the entrance if not as near as possible. And reduce the "reduced section" of food to very cheap prices (more than 70%, 90%  or 99% off).

rejection.details:
Reductions are the responsibility of individual supermarkets and shops. 

You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a related action: 

Ban supermarkets from throwing away or destroying unsold safe food 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/754118
